column4: Anyone succeded installing Ubuntu and using correctly the X Server with an ATI Mobility Radeon x700 graphic card?
well, np, have you installed fglrx?
well go to the term and type 'aticonfig' and just hit return
it will give you a number of options, there should be something that looks like it applies to you, give it a go
are you getting video at all?
I haven tried to play a video, I can actually do almost anything, Im using the computer right now.
